member.name: M:FLEXYGO.Objects.EntityObject.BasicProperties(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Gets a collection of properties with basic information for the current object. It only returns Properties defined in data base. If there are no properties defined in db it will return all table fields.
When there is a view name it will build the properties based on view columns.
